title: @Riot KateyKhaos I gifted my friend and yet the Pumpkin icon hasn't appeared in my icon list.
body: Does it require a few days like the Star Guardian icon or did it not work?

replies.body: It generally takes a bit of time for icons to be granted, yes. :) I don't have mine either just yet!
same here but once its not there in 2017 [since break time till preseason is done], i will ask for it xD
